top.title: Takeaways from the millions of newly released Epstein files
top.summary: Three million new documents include hundreds of mentions of Trump and emails between Epstein and a person called "The Duke".

top.title: Israeli air strikes kill at least 32 Palestinians in Gaza, rescue officials say
top.summary: Israel's military confirmed the strikes, which come during a ceasefire that Israel and Hamas accuse each other of breaking.

top.title: Pedro Pascal and Meryl Streep lead tributes to Catherine O'Hara
top.summary: The Canadian comedic actress died in Los Angeles on Friday at the age of 71 following a brief illness.

top.title: Musk's SpaceX applies to launch 1m satellites into orbit
top.summary: The firm wants to create a network of "orbital data centres" to power artificial intelligence.

top.title: Apple reports best-ever iPhone sales as Mac dips
top.summary: The company's revenue was boosted by iPhone sales, but sales of its wearable tech and Mac computers dipped.

top.title: He calls me sweetheart and winks at me - but he's not my boyfriend, he's AI
top.summary: George is an avatar on my mobile but claims to know  what makes me tick.
